page.title: 10Farming Sandon Lodge
page.content: {Sandon Lodge Farm,Sandon,Essex,CM2 7SJ Mrs Speakman owns the farm which is managed by her son Richard Speakman. {Rotation:}A 3 five-year rotation plan is used. Each five year cycle introduces a "break crop"(*) to invigorate the soil. 1) 1st year - Oil Seed Rape. 2nd year - Winter wheat 1. 3rd year - Winter wheat 2. 4th year - Peas * 5th year - Winter barley. 2) 1st year - Winter barley. 2nd year - Oil Seed Rape * 3rd year - Winter Wheat 1. 4th year - Winter Wheat 2. 5th year - Winter Barley/Peas 3) 1st year - Oil seed Rape 2nd year - Winter wheat 1. 3rd year - Winter wheat 2. 4th year - Peas* 5th year - Winter barley.
